name: Kiddienomicon
description:
This game was done in the 2016 Global Game Jam. We did not had time to polish it so the final level was a really tricky riddle that not much people could get it.

If you are looking for clues, the riddle will tell you a series of numbers in which order to lit the candles. For example, 5 on the left, 7 on the right means:

5 _ _ _ _ _ _ 7

Good luck!

 https://globalgamejam.org/2016/games/kiddienomicon
